entry.title: [FR][VoIP] - VoIP service degradation
entry.content:
Jun 13, 09:15 UTC
Resolved - This incident has been resolved.

Tuesday, June 7th 2022, our interconnection with Orange switched over its backup during 10:05 -> 11:10, 11:15 -> 12:20, 15:50 -> 17:00 UTC+2. Hence some calls never reached their destination during those periods.
Some impacted clients attempting phone calls during those periods might have seemingly reached their target but may have experienced one-way or no audio.

Jun 9, 12:48 UTC
Update - Ongoing actions : Our teams are still working on the problem.

Jun 7, 12:19 UTC
Investigating - Start time : 07/06/2022 07:00 UTC
Service impact : Incoming call may result in one way call.
Customers aren't able to hear the other person
Ongoing actions : Our teams are currently working to solve the problem
